subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Like Barry Bonds’s pursuit of the career home run record, Brett Favre’s assault on the N.F.L.’s passing records will be a major story line of the 2007 season.
snippet: Like Barry Bonds’s pursuit of the career home run record, Brett Favre’s assault on the N.F.L.’s passing records will be a major story line of the 2007 season.
